name: Kosupure Akademī
description:
Ever wanted to go to the anime world? Attend a real anime high school? Well now ,you can with this game. コスプレアカデミー (Kosupure Akademī) is now enrolling new students.

You transferred from another school, where you meet a colourful array of characters. You set yourself a goal to bed as many students as you can!! You have three days to bed one of the several husbandos and waifus. Are you ready for the challenge?

Can't wait to see you there!
Signed
Everyone's favourite Principal! ;)
